fields.name: low intensity
fields.description: Body weight and light weights only. Low intensity circuits. Starting the week should set you up not break you down.

fields.name: high intensity
fields.description: Body weight and light weights only. Increased intensity and circuit level difficulty. It is important to increase the level of difficulty as you progress from beginner to more advanced.

fields.name: heavy weight
fields.description: Heavy weights. Workout to build strength and power. Know your limits and overtime. Add/remove weight based on rep count.

fields.name: stretching
fields.description: Stretching is vital to prevent injury. Additional benefits are a stronger core and increased flexibility. Both of which are curcial for maximising the benefits of weight training days.

fields.name: boxing
fields.description: Boxing has many benefits. Cardio, speed, endurance and power to name a few. This is a full body workout.

fields.name: running
fields.description: Running or even walking at a faster pace followed by stretching is very important and often gets overlooked. Working out should not just be about lifting weights. It should cover all areas.

fields.name: rest day
fields.description: Rest day is just as important as any of the workouts. The body needs time to build back up the tissues damaged while exercising.
